specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Pleated Pleating is a heat-setting technique where fabric is placed between a two-part mould and placed inside a steaming machine.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Charmeuse This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Mechanical > Pleated To prevent the pleated fabric from losing its wrinkles, we discourage ironing and rolling the fabric. Fold and store it instead.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Dresses, Pajamas, Partywear, Abaya
